description: Well the big game has finally come and gone, another bowl season behind us, and next comes the ugly part: paying up all those bets. Only one problem: money is tight and Marcus is demanding payout. What to do? Will these two hook up again? You can bet on it!Enjoy!
title: SETTLING UP
